strapiEvent.name: WOZ Sunset Summit
strapiEvent.description:
The 2nd Annual WOZ Sunset Summit returns to Bentonville Sep 15-17.

  • Join the ride: Join a group of top industry leaders and world-renowned coaches for a women-led weekend of rides, clinics, workshops, and discussions to build confidence and community around cycling.
  • Make friends: Tickets include access to the three-day event, including an opening reception Friday night, food and drinks on Saturday, a ticket to the Sunset Party at Ledger, and more. The event's fundraising efforts support year-round programs that break down barriers for women in cycling and promote womenâ€™s health and wellness.

Reserve your spot HERE.
